Row.Text: Voices of the Mountains
Talking Trees
Air of the Sand
People have been hearing strange whispers coming from the mountains. The citizens are curious and want an explanation. What should we say?
People have been hearing strange whispers coming from the forests. The citizens are curious and want an explanation. What should we say?
People have been hearing strange whispers coming from the desert. The citizens are curious and want an explanation. What should we say?
Tell them they are hearing the sighs of our mother, Earth. Let it teach us!
Tell them they are hearing the words of an ancient oracle! Let it inspire us!
Tell them they are hearing the voices of our ancestors! Let us embrace them!
The dedication of our citizens has resulted in {2_InstantYield}.
Mysterious Wanderer

A cloaked figure lingers outside the City's Walls. When asked why he has come to the city, he hands the guard a tattered letter:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"I am a man of many talents, but I have no home. Mute since birth, I teach and train without words. I can offer you one of three talents in exchange for hospitality and a home."
"The gift of the artist."
Gain {4_GPChange} in the City.
"The gift of the craftsman."
Gain {4_GPChange} in the City.
"The gift of the soothsayer."
Gain {4_GPChange} in the City.
"The gift of the trader."
Gain {4_GPChange} in the City.
"The gift of the warrior."
Gain {2_InstantYield} in the City.
"The gift of the explorer."
Gain {2_InstantYield} in the City.
Quite The Rug

An enormous beast, responsible for deaths of many men, has finally fallen. Hunters flock to see the proof of the deed, which hold pridge of place in the - now legendary - lodge.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a result, a short WLTKD starts in the City.
The Remains of a Terrible Monster
A local farmer has uncovered the bones of some kind of huge creature unlike any seen in living memory. Would you like us to send some men to acquire these remains?
Find out if there are more of these creatures in the area then put them all on public display.

Begin 5 turns of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]WLTKD[ENDCOLOR] and gain {2_InstantYield} towards Border Growth in this City (only affects Border Growth); however, local Farms lose 1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for {5_Turns}.
We should find a great storyteller to create a tale about some brave knight who must have killed the beast in an epic battle to rescue a damsel in distress!
The monetary prize of {1_YieldCost} has resulted in {4_GPChange} for the City.
Although it will not make our citizens happy, see if we can sell this creature. Our treasury needs a boost.
Gain {2_InstantYield} from the auction of the fossil.The City revolts for 2 turns.
Have our finest craftsmen carve up these relics to sell in the marketplace.
After a production cost of {1_YieldCost}, the sale of the relics result in a gain of {3_CityYield} for the next {5_Turns}.
A Terrible Lizard
Some of those dinosaur bones that get people so excited have been dug up at a local farm. What do you want us to do about it?
I don't care about any dead reptiles! Turn them into something useful like chess pieces or musical instruments!
You gain 1 copy of [ICON_RES_IVORY], but it costs {1_YieldCost}.
The existence of these 'dinosaurs' is a matter of some debate. We should ask our religious leaders what their opinion is.
The trust you put into the clergy results in {2_InstantYield}, but this action angers many of our scientists resulting in {1_YieldCost}.
Who knows what other discoveries are in this area. Create a new department at the University to continue these digs and study these fossils.
All local Tundra permanently loses 1 [ICON_FOOD]; however, the City gains {4_GPChange} and local Stone resources gain 1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Dinosaurs are so inspirational. We should fund a new exhibit at the Museum with this find taking center stage.
Funding the musuem grant costs {1_YieldCost}. For the next {5_Turns}, the new exhibit yields +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.
Religious Relics

A local community leader, known for his piety and devotion, has recently died in the City. There are starting to be rumors of miracles happening when people visit his tomb. How do you want us to respond?
We must spread the word about these miracles far and wide.
A Missionary appears near the City.
Instruct the priests to accomodate any visitors. We can turn the Temple into a new pilgrimage site.
For the next {5_Turns}, the Temple gains +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.
Find me a person who will pay for the relics of this saint!
Gain {2_InstantYield} from the sale of these relics.
